listitem.para: OPENICF-267: LocalConnectorInfoManagerImpl fails with non-file URLs
OPENICF-262: AD .Net connector: CREATE fails if __ENABLE__ is not set
OPENICF-261: LDAP connector: Server Type detection should be done in an anonymous way
OPENICF-254: The SLF4JLog throws NPE when the message is null
OPENICF-253: Powershell connector liveSync doesn't work with multivalued attributes
OPENICF-243: There are typo problems in the methods names and Java, .Net methods have different name
OPENICF-242: The default resource name is not compatible with C# resource designer
OPENICF-236: The TestHelper can not convert the values from config.xml
OPENICF-235: InvalidAttributeValueException's {0}, {1} doesn't behave as variable
OPENICF-233: When setting TIMEOUT on operations, .Net connector framework does not handle exceptions properly
OPENICF-231: Exceptions doesn't contain resource name
OPENICF-225: not operator incorrectly constructed in AD connector filter query
OPENICF-224: The SyncDelta can not hold the ObjectClass of deleted object for operation with ObjectClass.ALL
OPENICF-223: The C# delegate type is not compatible with Java and it does not work in PowerShell Runspace
OPENICF-218: The Connector Bundle loading is inconsistent regards the available classes
OPENICF-217: Few typos in ScriptedREST's source code in anotations for javadoc
OPENICF-216: ScriptedREST, reloadScriptOnExecution property does not seem to work
OPENICF-215: Spaces removed from DN during normalization if preceded by an escaped comma
OPENICF-202: The scripted-commons library wraps all Exceptions into ConnectorException
OPENICF-192: CSV File Connector does not escape asterisk as field delimiter
OPENICF-189: LDAP connector should return better error message when authentication fails with Active Directory
OPENICF-175: scriptedREST connector samples do not show that the configuration object is passed to the scripts
OPENICF-171: LDAP simple paged results fails to return all results when performing search against root context
OPENICF-169: TimestampsSyncStrategy use PagedResultsControl, not supported by SunDS 5.2 and 6.3 (7?)
OPENICF-167: Scripted common should handle the case where __NAME__ is not part of Create() attribute set
OPENICF-164: Sample 3 (ScriptedSQL) tools scripts has unnecessary sql.commit()
OPENICF-163: LDAP Connector does not use paged results/blocks searches with group objectclass
OPENICF-151: LDAP connector: JNDI Bad handling of RDN with \ or " character
OPENICF-149: VMS connector does not return the right status (runScriptOnResource)
OPENICF-146: VMS connector does not accept "_" for DIRECTORY
OPENICF-145: .NET Connector Server - command line execution of /uninstall fails - exception error
OPENICF-144: LDAP connector throws PartialResultException when working with AD default naming context
OPENICF-142: The runScriptOnResource fails if the loginUser is not root
OPENICF-136: .Net Framework does not add FilteredResultsHandler to the filter chain if AttributesToGet property is set
OPENICF-134: LDAP connector should log message instead of java stack when retrieved entry is not found
OPENICF-131: "Join" link in OpenICF webpage is bad
OPENICF-124: LDAP Connector: AD large groups (>1500 members) limitation needs to be workaround using range
OPENICF-119: LdapConnector liveSync keeps blocking on deletions
OPENICF-113: Rename during update
OPENICF-111: LDAP connector does not recognize expired passwords for MSAD
OPENICF-110: Multivalue attribute handling first value
OPENICF-109: LDAP connector raising NPE when reading a group that has no member
OPENICF-108: SunDSChangeLogSyncStrategy throw javax.naming.NameNotFoundException when processing DELETE event
OPENICF-107: test ticket
OPENICF-103: BufferedResultsProxy may cause dead lock
OPENICF-100: Exchange connector: compilation error since AD connector Attribute Normalizer is gone
OPENICF-94: AD connector systematically upper case the DNs
OPENICF-93: LDAP connector rename operation should check if the new DN is not the same as the previous one
OPENICF-91: LDAP connector: Renaming an entry throws an exception
OPENICF-87: On update, Posix groups maintenance may throw an NPE
OPENICF-84: LDAP Connector does not throw AlreadyExistsException
OPENICF-82: ScriptedSQL returns NullPointerException when token reset or sync() called for the first time
OPENICF-81: DatabaseTableConnector can't handle timestamp data type from Oracle
OPENICF-79: Solaris connector - __UID__ attribute is not mapped
OPENICF-78: Multivalue attribute handling
OPENICF-77: Byte is not a supported type in the framework
OPENICF-68: VMS Connector package does not include jsch jar.
OPENICF-67: VMS connector runScriptOnResource method String[], but openIdm expect String
OPENICF-66: LDAP connector should return with working UID if the uidAttribute is set to DN attribute

section.title: Limitations
section.para: No particular limitations are identified for this release.

section.title: Known Issues
section.para: The following known issues remained open at the time of release.

listitem.para: OPENICF-276: Ldap connector does not handle maintain group membership properly for renaming user
OPENICF-275: Powershell connector is not compatible with Windows2012R2
OPENICF-269: Add the 'legal-notices' folder with necessary license files
OPENICF-255: rename framework deliverable from openicf-zip-1.4.0.0.zip to openicf-1.4.0.0.zip
OPENICF-222: CSV Connector enters infinite loop if a records attribute value starts with (but does not end with) the configured valueQualifer
OPENICF-208: ScriptedREST connector is missing few required bundles.
OPENICF-170: XML connector scheduler reconciliation fails with premature end of file exception
OPENICF-161: VMS Connector / Validation RegExp for Directories is not correct
OPENICF-159: LDAP connector referralsHandling=follow causes invalidCredentials exception
OPENICF-140: GoogleApps connector - reconciliation group error (OpenIDM->GoogleApps)
OPENICF-139: GoogleApps connector - user update with unexpected behaviour (GoogleApps->OpenIDM)
OPENICF-128: .NET AD Connector does not use "SearchContext" property
OPENICF-104: Sync operation must stop processing the change objects if the SyncResultsHandler returns false
OPENICF-89: Querying solaris accounts with sudo results in timeout
OPENICF-88: Some attributes cannot be created in AD by contract tests.
OPENICF-86: Contract Tests Active Directory E_ACCESSDENIED thrown when creating user fails
OPENICF-61: XML Connector throws errors when using special characters in user account.
OPENICF-59: NPE when the AttributeInfo is null
